member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.FreeImageDecoder.FreeImageDecoderPlugin.DecodeAndCall(System.IO.Stream,ImageResizer.ResizeSettings,ImageResizer.Plugins.FreeImageDecoder.FreeImageDecoderPlugin.DecodeCallback)
member.summary: Decodes the given stream, selects the correct page or frame, rotates it correctly (if autorotate=true), then executes the callback, then cleans up.
